home.intro: I'm an enthusiastic Full Stack Developer with a distinctive background in Biology. My journey into the tech world began during my biology studies when I harnessed languages like R and Python for statistical analysis and data manipulation. As I embraced programming challenges, I immersed myself in development, cloud computing, and databases. Currently pursuing a degree in Systems Analysis and Development, I am excited to channel my software expertise into solving the most versatile problems.

project2.title: Electronic Medical Record System for Rare Diseases Patients
project2.description: The "Electronic Medical Record System for Rare Diseases Patients" project proposes an innovative electronic data registration platform for health-related information, specifically designed for the monitoring and treatment of patients with rare diseases. The platform is developed as a REST application, with functionalities accessible through both user interfaces and integration with other healthcare systems.The platform comprises three distinct user profiles: administrator, physician, and patient. Patients can be registered by physicians or perform self-registration. The system encompasses mandatory requirements that span from installation and configuration to user and data registration and management functionality.
